mapper.select: select board.IDX , board.TITLE ,board.CONTENTS ,board.THUMBS_UP ,board.THUMBS_DOWN ,board.WARNING,board.REG_DATE ,board.WRITER, board.UP_DATE ,board.VIEW_POINT ,board.USE_YN , cast((select count(*) from TBL_FREE_COMMENT cmt where board_idx = board.IDX) as unsigned) as COMMENT_CNT from TBL_FREE_BOARD board order by idx desc limit ${page}, 20;

select board.IDX , board.TITLE ,board.CONTENTS ,board.THUMBS_UP ,board.THUMBS_DOWN ,board.WARNING,board.REG_DATE ,board.WRITER, board.UP_DATE ,board.VIEW_POINT ,board.USE_YN , cast((select count(*) from TBL_FREE_COMMENT cmt where board_idx = board.IDX) as unsigned) as COMMENT_CNT from TBL_FREE_BOARD board order by idx desc limit 0,5;

SELECT * FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
